member.name: IMFCollection.AddElement
member.summary: Adds an object to the collection.
member.param: Pointer to the object's IUnknown interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFCollection.GetElement
member.summary: Retrieves an object in the collection.
member.param: Zero-based index of the object to retrieve. Objects are indexed in the order in which they were added to the collection.
Receives a pointer to the object's IUnknown interface. The caller must release the interface. The retrieved pointer value might be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCollection.GetElementCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of objects in the collection.
member.param: Receives the number of objects in the collection.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFCollection.InsertElementAt
member.summary: Adds an object at the specified index in the collection.
member.param: The zero-based index where the object will be added to the collection.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFCollection.RemoveAllElements
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFCollection.RemoveElement
member.summary: Removes an object from the collection.
member.param: Zero-based index of the object to remove. Objects are indexed in the order in which they were added to the collection.
Receives a pointer to the IUnknown interface of the object. The caller must release the interface. This parameter cannot be NULL, but the retrieved pointer value might be NULL.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFCollection
member.summary: Represents a generic collection of IUnknown pointers.
